title: Citrus aurantiifolia
Vernacular name: English- Key lime </br> Hindi- Jambiri, nimbu </br> Gujarati- Limboo </br> Sanskrit- Nimbuka </br>
Parts of plant used: leaves, fruit, peel and essential oils
Therapeutic uses: Used as an antiseptic, antiviral, antifungal, anthelmintic, astringent, diuretic, mosquito bite repellent
